items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine to suggest products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update dynamically based on the user's recent activity within 1 minute.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
AI model training and deployment infrastructure
non_functional: System uptime of 99.9% for recommendation service
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed the need for personalized recommendations using AI and integration with existing e-commerce platform.
